tags.name: Business User Management
tags.description: API for managing users within a business

tags.name: File Management
tags.description: API for file upload and management

tags.name: Business Admin Management
tags.description: API for assigning admins to businesses

get.description: Get one staff member in this business

put.description: Update staff profile (name, phone, status) and/or biz assignment status

put.summary: Assign role to user in business
put.description: BIZ_ADMIN assigns a role (and optional menu permissions) to a user under this business

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID (the user must belong to this business)

post.description: Upload a single file with optional description

get.description: Get all staff for a business (Staff Management). Optional filter by status and search by name/username.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by full name or username

post.description: Create a new user for a specific business

post.summary: Create user with roles and permissions
post.description: Create a user with specific roles and menu permissions
Assign an existing user as admin to a business with specific menu permissions

get.description: Current stock quantity for one item in a business
Current on-hand quantity per item for a business
Get list of all uploaded files
Retrieve metadata for a specific file
Roles that BIZ_ADMIN can assign to users in this business (excludes SYSTEM_ADMIN)
Get all menu permissions assigned to a business admin
